鞕鞕鞕

鞕字的基本解释

鞕
biān
古同“鞭”。

鞕
yìng
古同“硬”，坚。
古同“鲠”，哽塞。

鞕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yìng］
［《廣韻》五諍切，去諍，疑。］
同“硬1”。
坚牢。
[②]［gěng］
同“鯁1”。
哽塞。
[③]［biān］
同“鞭1”。

鞕字的康熙字典解释

【戌集中】【革字部】　鞕； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1388第01
【廣韻】五更切【集韻】【正韻】魚孟切，?音硬。【玉篇】堅也。【廣韻】堅牢。【博雅】?也。

鞕字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鞕字的起名意思

暂无。

Yin
Basic explanation of words
Yin
biān
Gu Tong "whip".
Yin
yìng
Gu Tong is "hard" and firm.
Gu Tong "kun", choking.
Yin
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yìng］
["Guangyun" cuts five criticisms, removes criticisms, and doubts. ]
Same as "Hard 1".
Be firm.
[②]［gěng］
Same as "鲠1".
Choking.
[③]［biān］
Same as "Whip 1".
Yin
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集】【The Department of Leather Characters】　鞕; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1388 No. 01
【Guangyun】Five more cuts【Jiyun】【Zhengyun】fish and meng cut, with hard tone. [Jade articles] Strong also. [Guang Yun] Be firm. [Bo Ya]? Also.
